text: Nihsansaya, jya lokanni imana rakhale ani allahasathi desatyaga kela arthata hijarata keli ani jihada kele dhanane va manane allahacya margata, ani jyanni asa lokanna asraya dila, ani tyanna madata keli tara te ekamekance apasata mitra aheta ani jyanni imana rakhale, pana desatyaga kela nahi tara tumacyasi tyanci kincitahi maitri nahi, parantu jara te dharmacya babatita tumacyakade madata magatila tara tyanna madata karane tumacyasathi avasyaka ahe, matra tya lokankherija, ki tumacya va tyancya daramyana pratijna karara jhala ahe ani je kahi tumhi karita ahata, allaha te cangalya prakare pahata ahe
